title: Kevin Cruz
subtitle: Software Engineer
description: I'm a Software Engineer specializing in Front-end, I am passionate about technology and innovation. I was a Freelance for several companies in my city (Bogotá), improving the management of the business with different solutions. Now I'm working in a company as Software Engineer, creating web components

home.title: Home
home.text: Hi, I'm Kevin Cruz, a Software Engineer specializing in Front-end, I am passionate about technology and innovation. I was a Freelance for several companies in my city (Bogotá), improving the management of the business with different solutions. Now I'm working in a company as Software Engineer, creating web components
